metadata.title: USN-3276-1 -- shadow vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Sebastian Krahmer discovered integer overflows in shadow utilities. A local attacker could possibly cause them to crash or potentially gain privileges via crafted input. (CVE-2016-6252)  Tobias St√∂ckmann discovered a race condition in su. A local attacker could cause su to send SIGKILL to other processes with root privileges. (CVE-2017-2616)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3276-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  passwd - 1:4.1.5.1-1ubuntu9.4 login - 1:4.1.5.1-1ubuntu9.4 uidmap - 1:4.1.5.1-1ubuntu9.4 No subscription required
